item.title: RT by @gakonst: ERC4337 bundling across users seems like a non-usecase? what do you really save? 21k gas of compute per user's batch? peanuts. what do you tradeoff? smart contract complexity, not having 1:1 mapping between user action and on-chain operation, latency for users waiting to be bundled with other users...if you say BLS sig aggregation I'll answer that you haven't measured the cost of pairings for verifying across multiple users w/ diff messages (not 1 user)
